channel.title: Editing commands (TrisidiaX Source)
channel.description: So basically I am trying to edit commands on my server which uses the TrisidiaX source and so I go into commands.java and edit the commands but after I save + compile when I load up the game the commands haven't changed from their defaults or taken effect. Please help, I have no clue what is going wrong. :confused:

item.title: Editing commands (TrisidiaX Source)
item.dc:creator: @Not_Botting Not Botting
item.description:
@Not_Botting wrote:

After looking at your other post, I don’t think your compiler even works… make sure you have JDK installed, find the location of your JDK, right click your compiler .bat file > change the directory to its location.

Read full topic

item.title: Editing commands (TrisidiaX Source)
item.dc:creator: @Pkor159 Pkor159
item.description:
@Pkor159 wrote:

Best help anyone will give you:
GET A BETTER SOURCE!
Why?
BECAUSE THE SOURCE IS A FUCKING GLITCH!
What kind of glitch?
DUPES, COMBAT GLITCHES, TERRIBLE COMBAT, VERY UNSTABLE.

Read full topic

item.title: Editing commands (TrisidiaX Source)
item.dc:creator: @Kuhgar Kuhgar
item.description:
@Kuhgar wrote:

sk8rdude461:

Well, what part of the commands are you editing… exactly…

For example:
I made:
if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“pkp”)) {
c.sendMessage(PK Points: “+ c.pkPoints+”");
}

I changed this from the default of:

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“pkp”) || playerCommand.startsWith(“Pkp”) || playerCommand.startsWith(“PKP”) || playerCommand.startsWith(“pkP”) || playerCommand.startsWith(“insidp”)) {
c.sendMessage(""+ Config.SERVER_NAME +" Points: “+ c.pkPoints+”");
}

When in game it still prints out Config.SERVER_NAME and prints out TrisidiaX Points: ## on screen. Also, I dont know why it still has the Config.SERVER_NAME set as TrisidiaX even though I changed that in the Config file. Help pl0x

Read full topic
